result.title: Growth Marketing Associate
result.description:
We are looking for a Head of Growth Marketing with expertise in both acquisition and retention performance marketing to drive long-term growth for Queenly. This individual will play an integral role in shaping the future of Queenly by developing, executing, and refining a holistic growth marketing strategy. This person will have the opportunity to build out our marketing function and create necessary infrastructure to drive long-term sustainable growth for Queenly. We’re looking for someone to build an in-depth, robust marketing program from the ground up – setting the vision, defining the strategy, and leading 360-operational execution. The ideal candidate is fearlessly creative, analytical, and is known for his/her hustle and ability to execute against all odds.

Qualifications
-2-4+ years of experience in growth marketing with a proven track record of driving results and demonstrated experience developing and analyzing lifecycle marketing campaigns (email, social media, push, etc)
